snippet.title: Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter - Official Gameplay Reveal Trailer | ID@Xbox April 2024
snippet.description: Watch this gameplay reveal trailer for Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter to see bloody combat and vicious bosses from this upcoming sequel to the action RPG. The trailer, which is narrated by The Witcher's Doug Cockle, takes us into the dark world of Tails of Iron 2 as we learn about the threats that await on your dangerous quest. Tails of Iron 2: Whiskers of Winter is coming Xbox One and Xbox Series X/S, as well as PS5, PS4, Nintendo Switch, and PC. As Arlo, heir to the Warden of the Wastes, adventure through harsh northern lands, home to giant beasts and ragtag bandits, in an epic quest to overcome an ancient, blood-starved evil.
